column20: Charged Attack: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.
column264: Pounding Surprise: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.
column265: Sparkling Burst: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.
column266: Chained Reactions: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.
column267: Explosive Frags: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.
column268: Exquisite Compound: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column269: Sparkly Explosion: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
column270: Nova Burst: Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column271: Blazing Delight: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s. When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
